ComicInfo.Summary: Because of her forbidden love for the Deviant, Warlord Kro, Thena has betrayed her people. Meanwhile, the war between the Deviants and Eternals escalates and Ikaris and Kro come face-to-face to battle to the death. Where will Thena's allegiance lie when the life of man she loves is in danger?

ComicInfo.Title: Magnificient Obsession!
